title: Johnson's Baby Oil Gel, Moisturizing Baby Massage Mineral Oil Enriched with Shea & Cocoa Butter, Dry Skin Relief for Babies, Kids & Adults, Nourishing & Gentle on Delicate Skin, 6.5 fl. oz
description: Johnson's Baby Oil Gel is enriched with natural, moisturizing ingredients that soothe and protect skin from moisture loss. This soothing concentrated gel contains cocoa butter, known for its skin nourishing properties, as well as shea, known for its skin conditioning. This dermatologist-tested shea & cocoa butter oil locks in up to 10 times more moisture on wet skin than an ordinary lotion can on dry skin. Free of parabens, phthalates, dyes and lightly scented, this clinically proven mild baby oil is great to use as a baby massage oil. To use, gently massage baby oil gel onto damp skin after bathing to leave skin feeling baby soft and to help relieve dry skin. This nourishing baby oil gel works best on damp skin and is great for kids and adults too.
